description: Fireball &amp; Cran features the sweet and spicy flavors of Fireball, mingling with the tartness of the cranberry juice. The hint of lemon juice also provides a revitalizing zing to the drink.Thanks to its easy-to-find ingredients, this drink is also great for impromptu&nbsp;gatherings. Hurry up and give it a try next time you're in the mood for something sour and sweet.
name: Fireball & Cran

recipeInstructions.name: Put ice in a rocks glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Put ice in a rocks glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the Fireball, cranberry juice, and lemon juice into the glass and stir.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the Fireball, cranberry juice, and lemon juice into the glass and stir.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with a lemon or lime slice.
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with a lemon or lime slice.
